JTerminal

Class Terminal

extends java.lang.Object
    Author:

    • Field Detail

      • s_reader

        private static java.io.BufferedReader s_reader
        NT- замена для чтения с консоли под Эклипсой. Но ридер не закрывается нигде здесь до конца работы приложения. Вроде бы это нормально должно быть.

        public static void SetCursorPosition(int row,
                                     int col)

        Parameters:
        row - - row position of cursor
        col - - column position of cursor

      • ForceCursorPosition

        public static void ForceCursorPosition(int row,
                                       int col)
        Set cursor position as force (???) If an attempt is made to move the cursor out of the window, the result is undefined.
        Parameters:
        row - row position of cursor = 1 or more
        col - column position of cursor = 1 or more

      • ResetCursorPosition

        public static void ResetCursorPosition()
        Move cursor position to the home position (1;1) at the upper left of the screen.

        public static void ClearAllTabs()
        Clears all tabs.

      • EraseToLineEnd

        public static void EraseToLineEnd()
        Erases from the current cursor position to the end of the current line. Cursor position does not change.

      • EraseToLineStart

        public static void EraseToLineStart()
        Erases from the current cursor position to the start of the current line. Cursor position does not change.

      • EraseLine

        public static void EraseLine()
        Erases the entire current line. Cursor position does not change.

      • EraseDown

        public static void EraseDown()
        Erases the screen from the current line down to the bottom of the screen. clear from cursor to end of screen.

      • EraseUp

        public static void EraseUp()
        Erases the screen from the current line up to the top of the screen. clear from cursor to beginning of the screen

      • EraseScreen

        public static void EraseScreen()
        Erases the screen with the background colour and moves the cursor to home.

      • EraseScreenAndBuffer

        public static void EraseScreenAndBuffer()
        Erases the screen with the background colour and moves the cursor to home. clear entire screen and delete all lines saved in the scrollback buffer

      • PrintScreen

        public static void PrintScreen()
        Print the current screen on printer

      • PrintLine

        public static void PrintLine()
        Print the current line on printer

      • StartPrintLog

        public static void StartPrintLog()
        Start log; all received text is echoed to a printer.

      • StopPrintLog

        public static void StopPrintLog()
        Stop printing all received text. see startPrintLog() function.

      • SetKeyDefinition

        public static void SetKeyDefinition(int key,
                                    java.lang.String text)
        Associates a string of text to a keyboard key.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key by its ASCII value in decimal.
        text - String for specified key

      • SetAttributeMode

        public static void SetAttributeMode(int attr1,
                                    int attr2,
                                    int attr3)
        Sets 3 display attribute settings: fonttype, foreground color, background color
        Parameters:
        attr1 - - font type attribute value from TerminalMode class.
        attr2 - - text color attribute value from TerminalMode class.
        attr3 - - back color attribute value from TerminalMode class.

      • SetAttributeMode

        public static void SetAttributeMode(int attr1,
                                    int attr2)
        Sets 2 display attribute settings: fonttype, foreground color, background color
        Parameters:
        attr1 - - one of display attribute settings: fonttype, foreground color, background color value from TerminalMode class.
        attr2 - - other of display attribute settings: fonttype, foreground color, background color value from TerminalMode class.

      • SetAttributeMode

        Parameters:

        public static java.lang.String ReadLine()
